headline.main: Director Oliver Stone to Discuss 'Snowden' at Harvard School
headline.print_headline: Director Oliver Stone to Discuss 'Snowden' at Harvard School

docs.snippet: Academy Award-winning director Oliver Stone will talk about his new film, "Snowden," at the Harvard Kennedy School....
docs.lead_paragraph: Academy Award-winning director Oliver Stone will talk about his new film, "Snowden," at the Harvard Kennedy School.

headline.main: Quintana Wins Spanish Vuelta Ahead of Froome
headline.print_headline: Quintana Wins Spanish Vuelta Ahead of Froome

docs.snippet: Movistar rider Nairo Quintana won the Spanish Vuelta on Sunday, adding the title to the 2014 Giro d'Italia on his Grand Tour list of honors....
docs.lead_paragraph: Movistar rider Nairo Quintana won the Spanish Vuelta on Sunday, adding the title to the 2014 Giro d'Italia on his Grand Tour list of honors.

headline.main: Central Bankers Say Basel on Right Track With Bank Capital Rules
headline.print_headline: Central Bankers Say Basel on Right Track With Bank Capital Rules

docs.snippet: Regulators are heading in the right direction in reforming the way banks calculate how much capital they must hold to stay solvent, a group of central bankers said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Regulators are heading in the right direction in reforming the way banks calculate how much capital they must hold to stay solvent, a group of central bankers said on Sunday.

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton briefly appeared unsteady on Sunday during a ceremony marking the 15th anniversary of the Sept. 11 attack. Her physician later said Mrs. Clinton is being treated for pneumonia and dehydration....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton briefly appeared unsteady on Sunday during a ceremony marking the 15th anniversary of the Sept. 11 attack. Her physician later said Mrs. Clinton is being treated for pneumonia and dehydration.

headline.main: Oklahoma State Out of AP Top 25 After Controversial Loss
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma State Out of AP Top 25 After Controversial Loss

headline.main: US Open Champ Kerber Starting to Like Sound of No. 1 Ranking
headline.print_headline: US Open Champ Kerber Starting to Like Sound of No. 1 Ranking

docs.snippet: About to contest her third Grand Slam final of the year, Angelique Kerber couldn't help but hear the part of player introductions when she was announced to the crowd as soon-to-be No. 1 in the rankings....
docs.lead_paragraph: About to contest her third Grand Slam final of the year, Angelique Kerber couldn't help but hear the part of player introductions when she was announced to the crowd as soon-to-be No. 1 in the rankings.

headline.main: Police: DC Officer Kills Motorcyclist Who Rammed Squad Car
headline.print_headline: Police: DC Officer Kills Motorcyclist Who Rammed Squad Car

docs.snippet: A Washington police officer shot and killed a motorcyclist who rammed the passenger-side door of a police car after a traffic stop, police said Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Washington police officer shot and killed a motorcyclist who rammed the passenger-side door of a police car after a traffic stop, police said Sunday.

headline.main: France Arrests 15-Year-Old Boy for Planning 'Imminent' Paris Attack: Sources
headline.print_headline: France Arrests 15-Year-Old Boy for Planning 'Imminent' Paris Attack: Sources

docs.snippet: A 15-year-old boy has been arrested in Paris suspected of preparing imminent "violent action", two judicial sources said, the second alleged plot with links to Islamic State discovered in France this week....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 15-year-old boy has been arrested in Paris suspected of preparing imminent "violent action", two judicial sources said, the second alleged plot with links to Islamic State discovered in France this week.
